"Do-or-Die Data Collection":
"Thank you for helping me that last time. Unfortunately,
it seems the professor wasn't entirely satisfied with the
data I gave her. I'm afraid she might do something
crazy again, like going off to gather data on her own.
Could I interest you in joining me again?
I really want to get the necessary data before
she puts herself in danger again.

*Go with Wright only and complete the mission
with an S Rank on Hard difficulty or above."

"この前はどうもありがとうございました。
ただ、データを先生にお渡ししたところ
どうもまだ不十分だったようで……
このままじゃ先生、また自分で確かめに行く
なんて言い出しかねません！
今度こそ必要なデータを集めたいんですが
また同行をお願いできますか？

※ライトのみ同行、ハード以上Ｓランククリア"
